question: Which statements are correct regarding technical textiles?
option1: These textiles are used for Industrial purposes as well as decorated purposes.
option2: As of 2019, 348 technical textiles are developed by Bureau of Indian Standards(BIS).
option3: National textile mission is proposed from 2020-21 to 2023-24
explanation: Technical Textiles is a high technology sunrise sector which is steadily gaining ground in India. Technical textiles are functional fabrics that have applications across various industries including automobiles, civil engineering and construction, agriculture, healthcare, industrial safety, personal protection etc. Based on usage, there are 12 technical textile segments; Agrotech, Meditech, Buildtech, Mobiltech, Clothtech, Oekotech, Geotech, Packtech, Hometech, Protech, Indutech and Sportech. Under Union Budget 2020-21, a National Technical Textiles Mission is proposed for a period from 2020-21 to 2023-24 at an estimated outlay of Rs 1,480 crore (US$ 211.76 million).
